clues.text: The record for jet-to-jet kills is 16, accomplished by Capt. Joseph McConnell Jr. in his 1950s war

clues.text: In 1991 a stamp commemorating the 100th anniversary of this sport was issued in Springfield, Mass.

rounds.text: Made from a boiler at a Mobile, Alabama machine shop, it was deemed a success though it went down off Charleston 3 times
